reviewText: Here's a fun holiday riddle: what is Christmas without Jim and Them? Nothing, Jew. So buy this ish. You'll fall in love with this DVD without the help of racist cupid.

This video is the greatest thing to happen to Christmas since that Jesus feller! I watched this video and not only did I laugh til I came so hard I had to pinch the tip, but it instantly made my "Mike Steele" grow an extra 3 inches! I was so excited I quickly took a pic of it and sent it to Kristin (not Kevin's Kristin...she's prego and that's icky) and even she couldn't believe the holiday miracle that I had been blessed with. I was so confused by this that I immediately called my friend Jeff and asked for advice and he told me I just needed to get my swagga on and be based with that mess! So then I called my guy Brandon and told him he needed to rush right over to help me with my swagga. He said he'd be right there but of course he never showed. He was probably getting yelled at by his mom while drinkin' some Lieutenant Lime soda. Next of course I called my boy Jim to tell him about this amazing DVD but I'm pretty sure he couldn't hear me as usual cause he was rockin those sweet BEAT headphones and trying to scam websites into mailing him dragon vaginas, for "show purposes" of course. From there I did the only thing I could do and I ran outside to scream it to the neighborhood, about this amazing piece film that I had discovered, and quickly got distracted by my neighbor Jake who was just jumping over a slug...

I know this might be a little confusing and perhaps at times unbelievable but you know what...?

You heard it.

Without spoiling it too much I have to say this DVD is the best. It is literally the best ever, it is worth every penny of money that I slaved in a shoe factory for. If you've ever done meth then you'll love this DVD, because unlike meth it will make your brain release dopamine every time you watch it.

I'm not going to actually describe anything within the DVD because you should all buy it yourselves. But you should buy it direct from their website, [...] so they'll actually make a profit. When I watched it the first time, my testicles receded into my body and re-emerged from my anus.

OH man, this is some hot stuff people! You better get your hands on it. Okay? Alright.

ps this is chili pepper hot, I'm talking 5 alarm, no screw it, 6 ALARM hot. This is in regards to earlier when I said it was hot stuff.
